show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: Ebola Accused Of Causing A 347-Point Loss But Innocent As Charged

title: Ebola Accused Of Causing A 347-Point Loss But Innocent As Charged
content:
Why deflation is good – not bad. (It’s actually pretty obvious). The story of a woman who spent a month in jail for possession of…Spaghetti O’s!
Comment on the recent US Census Bureau’s report on income and poverty.
The numbers describing the economic status of Americans are almost all bad.
Americans are not earning their way out of poverty.
S&P companies have been borrowing money and using it to buy back shares of their own companies.
This will shortly cease for the simple reason that otherwise they will own al their own stock!
Apparently, business managers have realised that they have nothing better to do with their own money!
The death of economic freedom in the United States and the consequences.
Misreporting the debt and the deficit numbers.
Do not ever – under ANY circumstances – trust numbers which originate with the government.
Quoting from the final Chapter of Miyamoto Musashi’s “Book of Five Rings”, describing the essence of the Ni To Ichi Way of strategy.
